hr.fer.zemris.java.hw16.trazilica

Interface Environment


  • public interface Environment
    Environment that contains all relevant information for parsing text into Document objects and for executing commands that work with said documents.
    It also offers methods for reading user input and writing to the user.
    Author:
    Dan

        Adds a Document to this Environment. Vocabulary is updated with words in this document.
        Parameters:
        doc - a new document

      • getDocuments

        java.util.List<Document> getDocuments()
        Gets all documents.
        Returns:

      • getVocabulary

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getVocabulary()
        Gets the vocabulary containing words from all documents.
        Returns:
        Map with words from vocabulary as keys mapped to a number representing the order they were added in, which is useful for creating vectors for documents

      • buildVectors

        void buildVectors()
        Builds vectors for all documents in this Environment.
